Automation and Monitoring
Headphones monitoring If enabled then playing will be paused when headphones disconnected and then resumed when headphones connected back
Bluetooth monitoring If enabled then playing will be paused when headphones disconnected and thene resumed when bluetooth connected back
Auto play on loading If enabled and previously used station available then playing will be automatically start

ca-app-pub-5265061023469633/9916779909!-- real -->
Click Pause button (on very bottom) for temporary stopping. It will change to Play button to resume playing.\n Touching another station name will start playing it.\nSliding page to left or right will change tab in the same way as selecting tab label.\n Touching 3 vertical dots will open settings menu.
Long touching station name will show Record button. Touching Record will start it and replace button by Pause and Stop buttons.
Length of the recorded file. One megabyte is about 1 minute for 128 kBit per second bitrate.
Themes and font sizes
Various settings to monitor starting, connecting/disconnecting headphones etc.
Settings menu allows to change preferences for the monitoring of the changing device\'s condition, look and feel and recording settings. Un-checking station name will delete station from Favorites. When un-checking and re-positioning finished, touch Save button (floppy disk image).\n If Play/Pause or save button obscure repositioning controls then touch the button and slide finger to the other place on screen, then put finger away. Button well change its place
Use search string if you know full or partial name of the station.\nOtherwise use predefined categories to search by language, genre or country.\n Unfortunately not all stations available elsewhere could be found.\n Touching station name (if search or category selection produce result) will start playing and add station to the Favorites.\n If adding to Favorites is not desirable (wrong station or no playing started), then long touch will open dialog to exclude adding to Favorites.\n Another touch of the station that is already in the list will open dialog asking if you want to have duplicates in the Favorites.
Recordings categorized by their station name. Touching station name will open list of saved recordings.\n Touching recording name starts batch playing. That is indicated by the sliders. Top one allows to go back and forth by the batch list. Bottom slider allows to change position of the playing.\n Long touch of the recording name opens Delete dialog for that recording. Long touch of station\'s title will open dialog to delete all recordings for it.
Another way to delete station from Favorites is to long touch between left edge and center of radio button image TOP_POSITION_PAUSE_BUTTON
